TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ashraf_Ghani_Ahmadzai, title = Ashraf_Ghani_Ahmadzai, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ashraf_Ghani_Ahmadzai} }

S.FORM: Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai I 1945 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 19 a romi'ad masofoc ci Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Afghanistan anini i ci Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 29 a romi'ad.

Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai I 1945 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 19 a romi'ad masofoc ci Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Afghanistan anini i ci Ashraf Ghani Ahmadzai, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 29 a romi'ad.
